<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drum of Upheaval](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1281)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 30

**Price** 60,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This heavy drum is engraved along the sides with images of centaurs in fierce combat. The drum grants you a +3 item bonus on [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks you make using the drum. Additionally, it imparts the rhythms of two songs upon your mind as soon as you touch it. One is a fast marching cadence; the other is a frenetic ritual dance. Each song has a different activation.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** Dozens of spectral centaurs burst from the drum and stampede in a 60-foot cone. The stampede deals 7d10 force damage (DC 43 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The drum casts a DC 43 [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) spell.

**Craft Requirements** You are a [centaur](/Monsters.aspx?ID=76).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
